pr_title: Flag for filtering small SV equipment

timeline.message: Added MiscType.F_HEAVY_EQUIPMENT for equipment not valid for small SVs.

timeline.bodyText: Question, is this going to affect saves (especially mekhq ones)?

replies.bodyText: No. The only part of MiscType that gets serialized anywhere is te equipment lookup name.
